data.quote: I don’t think I’ll learn anything if I don’t try to do something about it on my own.
data.author: Chizuru Hishiro - ReLife

data.quote: A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.
data.author: Rock Lee - Naruto

data.quote: It may be hard right now, but you must silence those thoughts. Stop counting only those things that you have lost. What is gone, is gone.
data.author: Jinbei - One Piece

data.quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.
data.author: Monkey D. Luffy - One Piece

data.quote: Being strong isn’t just about having power or move, it about one’s spirit.
data.author: Roronoa Zoro - One Piece

data.quote: If you can’t do something, then don’t. Focus on what you can do.
data.author: Shiroe - Log Horizon
